dcterms:creator: E. Hairer

G. Wanner
dcterms:description: A dataset related to the dynamics of Volterra equations, used to demonstrate the effectiveness of volume-preserving neural networks in learning source-free dynamics.
dcterms:title: Volterra equations

dcterms:creator: H. Qin
S. Zhang

dcterms:description: A dataset concerning the dynamics of charged particles under the influence of Lorentz force, utilized to validate the proposed volume-preserving neural networks.
dcterms:title: Charged particle dynamics

dcterms:creator: X. Tu
B. Zhu
Y. Tang
H. Qin
J. Liu

dcterms:description: A dataset related to a charged particle model that incorporates the Lorentz force, used to demonstrate the capabilities of volume-preserving numerical schemes.
dcterms:title: Charged particle model (related to the Lorentz force)
